document_data.caption: A map showing Baron Street in south Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Baron Street
document_data.starts: The wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Baron Street''' was a road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Baron Street was located in the Zhentil Keep's [[Zhentil Keep/Harbor District|Harbor District]] in the south section of the city. The road was located on the eastern side of the Harbor District. It originated at the wall to the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]] then passed west before ending at the docks.
document_data.Notable Locations: A [[Zhentarim]] warehouse and [[Tern's Shipwright Service]] were located along Baron Street.
